评论详情: I used this for a Hel cosplay, and absolutely loved it! Very flattering, comfortable and soft fabric.

I got a size medium. My measurements 42/29/34. And I’m 5’3. I ordered two of these dresses in different colors. They are very sexy and very affordable. They’re the same dress as you get on Temu/Shein but you get these a lot quicker and it’s the same price.

评论概述: Absolutely love this dress. Perfect fit and soft material ✨✨✨
评论详情: Buy it. It’s beautiful, sexy. Can be used as a costume or a fun night out ! The leg sits and cross crossing on the sides really show off your curves , with the top being more modest. It’s the perfect combination ❤️
